flawed_nl_solution:
Mike is using 40 blocks / 2 = <<40/2=20>>20 blocks of type B.
He uses in total 40 blocks + 20 blocks = <<40+20=58>>58 blocks of type A and B.
So he is going to use 150 blocks - 58 blocks = <<150-58=92>>92 blocks of other types.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60.0, not 58.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
